== Porathissery (CT) (627925) ==

Porathissery (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 9.31 sq. km. and harbouring 4188 households with total population of 16768 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 16 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 286 km. Male population is 7829 and female population is 8939. Scheduled Caste population is 2256 and Scheduled Tribes population is 17. Census Location Code of the town is 627925<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 16 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 74 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 12 km.
